metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0214 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
login/token.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.10, 2.5.x before 2.5.6, and 2.6.x before 2.6.3 creates a MoodleMobile web-service token with an infinite lifetime, which makes it easier for remote attackers to hijack sessions via a brute-force attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0214` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.5+dfsg-1').
